Open source projects

Keep track of open source projects from Chicago's civic tech community. Recent commits show activity in the last 30 days.

Bonus! See a list of the most active contributors to these projects.

If you have a civic app and it's open sourced on Github, share it! We automatically update this list based on your activity.
